archimate:BusinessRole.name: Guardian
archimate:BusinessRole.documentation: An Identity Owner who administers Identity Data, Wallets, and/or Agents on behalf of a Dependent. A Guardian is different than a Delegateâ€”in Delegation, the Identity Owner still retains control of one or more Wallets. With Guardianship, an Identity Owner is wholly dependent on the Guardian to manage the Identity Ownerâ€™s Wallet. See Appendix C.
